mapper.update:
update pin
reqnum = #{reqnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
passenger = #{passenger,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stoptime = #{stoptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
carnumber = #{carnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cancel = #{cancel,jdbcType=BIT},
sender_openid = #{senderOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_openid = #{driverOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fromcity = #{fromcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tocity = #{tocity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sender_mobile = #{senderMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pinid = #{pinid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pin set reqnum = #{reqnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, passenger = #{passenger,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stoptime = #{stoptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carnumber = #{carnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cancel = #{cancel,jdbcType=BIT}, sender_openid = #{senderOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_openid = #{driverOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromcity = #{fromcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tocity = #{tocity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_mobile = #{senderMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pinid = #{pinid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from pin where passenger like '%${_parameter}%'
